description.value: Transforms a FHIR Appointment (ehealth-appointment profile) resource to a DK-HL7 Appointment Document (APD) XML document. The input FHIR Bundle contains a FHIR Composition (ehealth-composition profile) resource referencing a FHIR Appointment (ehealth-appointment profile) resource and referenced resources such as FHIR Organization. The returned FHIR DocumentReference contains the APD XML document adhering to the DK-HL7 Appointment Document profile.
